artwork.title: Skull of a Skeleton with Burning Cigarette

region.title: First Impression
region.observation: A human skull sits against a dark background, with what looks like a cigarette hanging from its jaw
region.why_notable: This unusual image immediately grabs attention and makes us wonder what story it's telling
region.soft_prompt: What's the first thing that catches your eye? How does this image make you feel?

steps.why_this_sequence: Starting with overall impression helps them process the striking subject matter

region.title: The Cigarette Detail
region.observation: A thin white cigarette is clenched between the skull's teeth, creating an almost humorous contradiction
region.why_notable: This detail transforms a scary skull into something almost playful or ironic
region.soft_prompt: Look closely at what's in the skull's mouth. What does this remind you of?

steps.why_this_sequence: Focusing on this key detail helps them see the artist's sense of humor
steps.builds_on: Building on their initial reaction to explore the unexpected elements

region.title: Light and Shadow
region.observation: The skull glows with warm yellows and creams against the deep black background, like it's lit by candlelight
region.why_notable: This dramatic lighting makes the skull feel alive and three-dimensional rather than flat
region.soft_prompt: Notice how the light hits the skull. Where do you think the light is coming from?

steps.why_this_sequence: Now they can appreciate the technical skill after connecting emotionally
steps.builds_on: After noticing the subject and details, they can see how light creates mood

region.title: The Skeleton's Body
region.observation: Below the skull, you can see the ribcage and other bones, painted with the same careful attention
region.why_notable: This shows the artist studied real anatomy, making this both art and science
region.soft_prompt: What do you think the artist was trying to learn by painting this?

steps.why_this_sequence: Ending with the full figure helps them understand this as a study, not just a spooky image
steps.builds_on: Completing the visual story from skull to full skeleton reveals the artist's purpose

welcome_text: You're looking at something both serious and playful. Take your time and let your eyes wander - what story do you think this painting is telling?

final_summary.main_takeaway: This painting mixes the serious study of human anatomy with a touch of dark humor
final_summary.connections: The glowing skull, the cigarette, and careful bone details work together to show an artist who could be both scientific and playful
final_summary.invitation_to_return: Each time you look, you might notice new details in the shadows or bones
final_summary.reflection_question: What do you think the artist was feeling when they painted this?

pedagogical_approach: Story-based progression from emotional reaction to personal connection, using accessible language and relatable comparisons

reflection_activities.title: What Does This Remind You Of?
reflection_activities.prompt: This painting shows a skeleton smoking a cigarette - something unexpected! What does this combination remind you of from your own life or things you've seen?
reflection_activities.placeholder: Maybe a movie, a joke, a Halloween decoration...
reflection_activities.why_this_activity: Assesses ability to make personal connections and comfort with sharing initial impressions

reflection_activities.title: The Artist's Mood
reflection_activities.prompt: You noticed this painting mixes serious anatomy study with playful humor. If van Gogh was sitting next to you right now, what do you think he'd tell you about his mood when he painted this?
reflection_activities.placeholder: I think he might have been feeling...
reflection_activities.why_this_activity: Tests empathy development and ability to connect artistic choices to human emotions

reflection_activities.title: Your Own Surprising Mix
reflection_activities.prompt: Van Gogh mixed something serious (skeleton study) with something unexpected (cigarette). Describe or sketch your own surprising combination that would make people look twice.
reflection_activities.placeholder: What two things don't usually go together?
reflection_activities.why_this_activity: Encourages creative thinking and tests understanding of artistic concept through personal application

responses.activity_activity_1: reminds me of Halloween time and also being cozy, smoking some nice weed at home.
responses.activity_activity_2: he would probably say he's also at home, being cozy during halloween time, smoking weed or a cigarette.
responses.activity_activity_3: a girl floating in the clouds holding a lot of concrete.

assessment.feedback: You're doing well at your current level. Keep practicing and challenging yourself with new observations.
